about_the_game:
Mysticism: Tales Of Gwyddien is a Virtual Reality game based on Celtic mythology and set in Wales. Play as a heroic magician protecting various landmarks around Wales from the evil of Annwn. Using magical abilities gifted by Gwyddien, the player will be able to alter the environment, and defeat powerful enemies.

Mysticism will feature two modes, the Arena and the Story mode(Currently in Development). Arena mode tests the player's skill against enemies in a single environment. This mode will also include online scoreboards.

The story mode is a narrative-driven experience. The player must climb Snowdonia to save Gwyddien and defeat the evil that awaits
